name: Illegal Traffic Race No Limits
description:
Illegal Traffic Race No Limits game is a very addictive and special new game in the field of endless racing game on google play!

Open your eyes and experience High Speed Illegal Traffic Race No Limits. Real driving physics like Asphalt. Check out your own driving stats and compare your score with your Friends.

Drive your car through Real Traffic. CUSTOMIZE your cars and boost your race, Try to be one in fastest drivers in Traffic Race.

It's Challenge to get High Score.

Master of Challenging and Addictive Game.

Illegal Traffic Race Features:

- Easy to learn but hard to master.

- Realistic Car Controls.

- Amazing Graphics.

- Amazing effects to make game more addictive.

- 3 Different Environments.

- Different Variety of Sports Cars.

- Cars Customization.

- Addictive Game Play.

- Thrilling Actions.

- Amazing Sound Effects.

- 2 Different Camera Views.

- Authentic race atmosphere.

- Customized to Play on tablets and phones.

How to Play:

- Tilt or Touch to steer.

- Touch right side Race button to Speed up.

- Touch left side Brake button to slow down.

- Touch horn button to get the way.

TIPS

- Drive Faster to get more score and cash.

What are you waiting for? Download Illegal Traffic Race No Limits and quench your thirst for fun and race!

This game is designed specially for teens and racing lovers.
